description: The file defines a React functional component named AppShell that constructs the main layout structure of a web application. It includes navigation, header, footer, and a slot for rendering child components, utilizing hooks like useState and useMemo, and imports other components such as Link, PreferencesPill, and SubtleButton.

methods.name: cn
methods.description: Utility function for conditional className string concatenation.

methods.name: AppShell
methods.description: Main React component that renders the application's layout including navigation, header, main content area, and footer.
